mapper.select: select * from Products where mainCategory_id = #{no} limit 0, 4
select count(*) as totcount, mainCategory_id from Products group by mainCategory_id

select avg(pr.prodReview_grade) as star, pr.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_sellPrice from ProdReviews pr, Products p where pr.product_id = p.product_id group by pr.product_id order by star desc limit 0, 3

select count(pr.prodReview_no) as count, avg(pr.prodReview_grade) as star, pr.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_sellPrice from ProdReviews pr, Products p where pr.product_id = p.product_id group by pr.product_id order by count desc limit 0, 3
select count(*) as count , product_id, product_name, product_sellPrice from BuyProducts where buyProduct_isFinished = 'Y'group by product_name order by count desc limit 0, 3
